allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Apex10 Crypto Education Platform

Features implemented:
- Top 10 crypto rankings with transparent methodology
- Security Hub with interactive checklist and threat awareness
- Learning Center with step-by-step guides
- 3D Orbital View visualization using Three.js
- Custom animated cursor with glow trail
- Holographic card effects with rainbow shimmer
- Live activity feed with simulated trades
- Sound design system with Web Audio API
- Spectacular 404 page with exploding text
- Confetti celebrations for achievements
- Scroll-triggered animations and parallax
- Command palette \(Cmd+K\) for quick navigation
- Discovery mode onboarding experience
- Particle backgrounds and floating orbs
- Market pulse with real-time price updates

Tech Stack:
- React 18 + TypeScript + Vite
- Cloudflare Workers + D1 Database
- Hono API framework
- Framer Motion animations
- Three.js / React Three Fiber
- TailwindCSS with custom design system

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
